mapper.insert: insert into like(member_id, article_id, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) (select #{memberId}, #{articleId}, #{created_at}, email, #{updated_at}, email from member where id = #{memberId});
mapper.select: select id, member_id, article_id, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by from like where article_id = #{articleId};
select id, member_id, article_id, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by from like where member_id = #{memberId};
